name: #Castle
description:
After saving the princess Simone from the Twitter monster, he is chasing you. Try to run-away from him in a castle full of monsters and traps.

This game was made for the Creative Week 2017 of Bellecour Ecole.

The theme was "Point of no return" and we've taken a two button only modifier.

The team:

Welmant Guillaume: Programmer 

Marty Astrid: Game artist 

Gallardo Clément: Game artist 

Broussal Mickaël: Level designer 

Savio Léonard: Game Designer 

Gal Joris: Project Manager
